stlib.interfaces.spatial

Interface LineIF

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GeneralTypeIF, Spatial
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CycleIF
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Cycle, Line

    public interface LineIF
extends GeneralTypeIF, Spatial
    Interface that should be provided by spatial objects of type line
    Author:
    Markus Fuessel

    • Method Summary

      Add the passed halfsegment to this 'Line' object.

        Updates the bounding box
        Parameters:
        segment -
        Returns:
        true if the adding was successful, false otherwise

      • add

        boolean add(PointIF p0,
            PointIF p1)
        Add the passed 'Point' objects to this 'Line' object
        Adds internally two halfsegments to this 'Line' object
        Updates the bounding box
        Parameters:
        p0 - - first endpoint
        p1 - - second endpoint
        Returns:
        true if the adding was successful, false otherwise

      • add

        Add the passed halfsegment to this 'Line' object.
        Updates the bounding box
        Parameters:
        halfsegment -
        Returns:
        true if halfsegment was added, false otherwise

      • clear

        void clear()
        Remove all segments from this 'Line' object and reset the bounding box

      • length

        double length(boolean useSphericalGeometry)
        Get the total length of this 'Line' object
        Parameters:
        useSphericalGeometry - - if true spherical geometry is used to calculate the length in metres, otherwise euclidean distance is used
        Returns:
        euclidean or geographical length, depends on parameter useSphericalGeometry
